description: Creates or updates an auto-termination policy for an Amazon EMR cluster. An auto-termination policy defines the amount of idle time in seconds after which a cluster automatically terminates. For alternative cluster termination options, see Control cluster termination.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the Amazon EMR cluster to which the auto-termination policy will be attached.

parameters.name: AutoTerminationPolicy
parameters.description: Specifies the auto-termination policy to attach to the cluster. IdleTimeout (integer) --- Specifies the amount of idle time in seconds after which the cluster automatically terminates. You can specify a minimum of 60 seconds and a maximum of 604800 seconds (seven days).

nested_params.name: IdleTimeout
nested_params.description: Specifies the amount of idle time in seconds after which the cluster automatically terminates. You can specify a minimum of 60 seconds and a maximum of 604800 seconds (seven days).
